document_data.name: Harthgroth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harthgroth''' were the largest of the [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nar]] tribes of [[Narfell]] from the 14{{th}} to 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: When the tribe was led by the veteran warrior [[Thalaman Harthgroth]], they could rally 4,000 riders to any cause.
document_data.Relationships: They viewed outlanders as potential sources of material wealth via trade, rather than targets for robbery to violence.
document_data.History: The Harthgroth were considered the ascendant tribe of [[Bildoobaris]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
